titlestmt.titleproper: Vincas Maci큰nas collection of manuscripts of 20th-century Lithuanian authors 1950-1977
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Vincas Maci큰nas collection of manuscripts of 20th-century Lithuanian authors
did.repository: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library

bioghist.p: Vincas Maci큰nas (1909-2003) joined the University of Pennsylvania Library in 1949 as a cataloger and classifier. He was promoted to a librarian in 1966 and retired from that position in 1978.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of manuscripts and typescripts by various 20th century Lithuanian authors collected by Vincas Maci큰nas. The works are poems and prose. Authors include Kazys Almenas, Aloyzas Baronas, Marius Katiliskis, Petronele Orintaite and Kazimieras Barenas.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
